titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a pilot program to expedite the onboarding process for new medical providers of the Department of Veterans Affairs, to reduce the duration of the hiring process for such medical providers, and for other purposes.
Veterans Improved Access and Care Act of 2019
Veterans Improved Access and Care Act of 2019
Veterans Improved Access and Care Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
